text: Recently ProgressLogging bars have been slurped into the vscode progress. Is there an option to disable this? I prefer the TerminalLoggers bars to the hidden notification vscode uses.

elements.text: Recently ProgressLogging bars have been slurped into the vscode progress. Is there an option to disable this? I prefer the TerminalLoggers bars to the hidden notification vscode uses.

text: Nope, not at the moment. Could add a setting for that though -- wanna open an issue?
